rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open Scandinavian style with minimalist furniture and natural light. Incorporates Vastu by placing the main entrance to the north.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room; features a simple, functional design promoting social interactions.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Efficient Scandinavian kitchen with modern appliances and open layout for easy access from dining area. Maintains Vastu by ensuring proper ventilation and placement of the stove.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, designed with Scandinavian minimalism and a large window facing north to maximize natural light per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact guest bathroom adjacent to the living area for convenience.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: Outdoor swimming pool with surrounding deck. Integrated into the design and accessible from the main living areas.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: Private area for domestic help located on the ground floor to ensure convenience and privacy.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Vastu compliant entrance aligned with north direction.

openings.name: Windows
openings.description: Energy efficient windows placed to maximize natural lighting and adhere to Vastu principles.

openings.name: Doors
openings.description: Sliding glass doors connecting indoor and outdoor areas, providing a seamless flow between spaces.
